noun.description: A follower or supporter of the moderate Lutheran reformer Philipp Melanchthon (1497–1560).

adjective.description: Of or relating to Philipp Melanchthon; adhering to his beliefs. rare.

origin: Early 18th century; earliest use found in Ephraim Chambers (?1680–1740), encyclopaedist. From the name of PhilippMelanchthon + -ist.
